text1: A Radiant-class battleship modified for Sierra's use. While integrating Sierra is simple enough, due to the ship being setup for AI control, integrating the Concord system was a difficult task. But the outcome is simply terrifying: Radiant that does not merely "skim" phase space, but submerges into it. Less of an elegant dancer and more of a brute who understands how to dance but cannot move their body properly to the music, the Promise is nevertheless a maul that can open the way.
